DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX);

-- JSON passed from ADF pipeline parameter
SET @json = N'@{pipeline().parameters.dataarray}';

MERGE dbo.POC_NS_Transaction AS tgt
USING (
    SELECT
        tl_uniquekey,
        t_id,
        t_status,
        TRY_CONVERT(DECIMAL(18,4), NULLIF(tl_netamount,'')) AS tl_netamount,
        COALESCE(is_deleted,0) AS is_deleted
    FROM OPENJSON(@json)
    WITH (
        tl_uniquekey BIGINT '$.tl_uniquekey',
        t_id BIGINT '$.t_id',
        t_status NVARCHAR(20) '$.t_status',
        tl_netamount NVARCHAR(50) '$.tl_netamount',
        is_deleted BIT '$.is_deleted'
    )
) src
ON tgt.tl_uniquekey = src.tl_uniquekey

WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
    tgt.t_id         = src.t_id,
    tgt.t_status     = src.t_status,
    tgt.tl_netamount = src.tl_netamount,
    tgt.is_deleted   = src.is_deleted,
    tgt.updated_at   = SYSUTCDATETIME()

WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN
INSERT (
    tl_uniquekey,
    t_id,
    t_status,
    tl_netamount,
    is_deleted,
    created_at,
    updated_at
)
VALUES (
    src.tl_uniquekey,
    src.t_id,
    src.t_status,
    src.tl_netamount,
    src.is_deleted,
    SYSUTCDATETIME(),
    SYSUTCDATETIME()
);
